entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:03 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Welland-Pelham 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain changing to rain in the evening then to light snow before morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
